summary:
This mod brings any alchemist his true alchemist focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the power of nature.
Use your skills to tactically set course with spells
that apply to alchemists only.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]The \"Mind\" series currently include:[/b]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123027495]A Keen Markmans Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124113739]A Dark Alchemists Mind[/url]


This mod brings any alchemist his true alchemist focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the power of nature.
Use your skills to tactically set course with spells
that apply to alchemists only.

All spellbooks are found at \"Elderblood Peak\"
(Console: coc dragonlair10exterior02)

[b]BASE SPELLS:[/b]
[b]Mindstate: Green Fingers[/b]
Put your mind in to full focus and perform alchemy on the go.
(Requires you to have your mortar with you)

[b]Mindstate: Nature\'s Gift[/b]
Put your mind in to full focus and recieve daily ingredient gifts that
are based on your current level.

[b]Focus: Herbalism[/b]
Fortifies your alchemy skill for 2 minutes.


[b]WEAPONS:[/b]
[b]Dagger of Infection[/b]
A long lost dagger that infects his opponent on touch.

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release
author: Dyramisty
